oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Story of Ellen Randolph - 1939-1m-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Episode of NBC radio drama The Story Of Ellen Randolph, starring Elsie Hitz as Ellen Randolph. Sponsored by Concentrated Super Suds, broadcast date unknown, circa October 1939.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unconfirmed] performs "[Unconfirmed song]" [incomplete] / (1:28) Opening statement and theme / (2:26) Elsie Hitz announces a Concentrated Super Suds commercial / (4:04) The Story Of Ellen Randolph episode / (13:05) Announcer talks about mail-in competition / (14:58) Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Hay, George D.
